headline: AEP Recognized as One of America's Best Large Employers
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) was named on Forbes magazine's America's Best Large Employers 2025 list. AEP also placed seventh in the utilities category.

headline: Why The S&P 500 Is A Hold Ahead Of February Jobs Report
summary: The upcoming February non-farm payrolls report is expected to show another increase in jobs, with government employment likely to weaken. Read my analysis here.
